name: Fallen Angel (itch) (Technofusion62)
description:
Blood.Biblical.Bullethell.

Developed in 1 week for a University Game Jam 

Narrative Summary: You play as Lucifer, a disgraced angel turned fallen angel, banished from the edge of Heavens Gates to plummet towards eternal damnation in the depths of Hell, but with an iron will and your newfound demonic determination annihilate all Demons and Angels who oppose you

Gameplay Summary: - Fall From Heaven To Hell Killing Any Demon Or Angel That Tries To Stop You - The Journey Is Split Into Multiple Areas To Fall Through - Each Area Will Change How Enemies Spawn And Will End With A Mini Boss - Dodge Enemy Projectiles and Melee Attacks - Clear Out Enemies Using Your Own Ranged or Melee Attack - Killing Builds Your Score Multiplier (Missing Or Taking To Long Resets It) - Killing Enemies Fills Your Rage Bar (Fill More If You Have A Multiplier) - Once At Full Rage Release Your Wrath Killing All Enemies On Screen - Our Game Will End After The Gates Of Hell In Limbo Where You Fight The Final Boss

Developed by Adam Hanson, Abi Southam, Ewan Miller, Harasaheb Seghal, Harry Rollinson, Jake Goodes
